1‚Üí#!/bin/bash
     2‚Üí# DevFlow Footer - Compact version with real data
     3‚Üíset -euo pipefail
     4‚Üí
     5‚Üí# Colors and defaults
     6‚ÜíRED='\033[0;31m'; YELLOW='\033[1;33m'; GREEN='\033[0;32m'; BLUE='\033[0;34m'; NC='\033[0m'
     7‚Üícontext_used=150066432; context_total=200000000; current_task="None"; progress_percent=0; standby_tasks=""
     8‚Üí
     9‚Üí# Get real context usage from ccusage if available
    10‚Üíif command -v ccusage >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    11‚Üí    context_used=$(ccusage --json 2>/dev/null | jq -r '.daily[-1].totalTokens // 150066432' || echo "150066432")
    12‚Üífi
    13‚Üí
    14‚Üí# Read current task and progress
    15‚Üíif [[ -f ".claude/state/current_task.json" ]]; then
    16‚Üí    current_task=$(jq -r '.task // "None"' ".claude/state/current_task.json" 2>/dev/null || echo "None")
    17‚Üí    progress_percent=$(jq -r '.progress_percentage // 0' ".claude/state/current_task.json" 2>/dev/null || echo "0")
    18‚Üífi
    19‚Üí
    20‚Üí# Count active services
    21‚Üíactive_services=0; total_services=0
    22‚Üífor pid_file in .*.pid; do
    23‚Üí    [[ -f "$pid_file" ]] && ((total_services++)) && kill -0 "$(cat "$pid_file" 2>/dev/null)" 2>/dev/null && ((active_services++))
    24‚Üídone
    25‚Üí
    26‚Üí# Get standby tasks from database or files
    27‚Üíif command -v sqlite3 >/dev/null 2>&1 && [[ -f "devflow.sqlite" ]]; then
    28‚Üí    standby_tasks=$(sqlite3 devflow.sqlite "SELECT SUBSTR(REPLACE(REPLACE(title, 'Prompt context: ', ''), 'Create ', ''), 1, 12) FROM task_contexts WHERE status IN ('active', 'pending') LIMIT 3" 2>/dev/null | head -3 | tr '\n' '¬∑' | sed 's/¬∑$//; s/¬∑/ ¬∑ /g' || echo "")
    29‚Üífi
    30‚Üí[[ -z "$standby_tasks" ]] && standby_tasks=$(find "sessions/tasks/" -name "*.md" -not -path "*/done/*" -not -name "TEMPLATE.md" 2>/dev/null | head -3 | xargs -I {} basename {} .md | cut -c1-12 | tr '\n' '¬∑' | sed 's/¬∑$//; s/¬∑/ ¬∑ /g' || echo "no-tasks")
    31‚Üí
    32‚Üí# Helper function to create progress bars
    33‚Üícreate_bar() { local filled=$(($1/10)); local bar=""; for((i=0;i<10;i++)); do [[ $i -lt $filled ]] && bar+="‚ñà" || bar+="‚ñë"; done; echo "$bar"; }
    34‚Üí
    35‚Üí# Calculate percentages and create bars
    36‚Üícontext_percent=$((context_used*100/context_total))
    37‚Üícontext_bar=$(create_bar $context_percent)
    38‚Üítask_bar=""; task_filled=$((progress_percent/15)); for((i=0;i<7;i++)); do [[ $i -lt $task_filled ]] && task_bar+="‚ñà" || task_bar+="‚ñë"; done
    39‚Üíservice_percent=$((total_services>0 ? active_services*100/total_services : 0))
    40‚Üíservice_bar=$(create_bar $service_percent)
    41‚Üí
    42‚Üí# Determine colors based on thresholds
    43‚Üí[[ $context_percent -gt 80 ]] && context_color=$RED || [[ $context_percent -gt 60 ]] && context_color=$YELLOW || context_color=$GREEN
    44‚Üí[[ $progress_percent -gt 75 ]] && task_color=$GREEN || [[ $progress_percent -gt 25 ]] && task_color=$YELLOW || task_color=$RED
    45‚Üí[[ $service_percent -gt 70 ]] && service_color=$GREEN || [[ $service_percent -gt 30 ]] && service_color=$YELLOW || service_color=$RED
    46‚Üí
    47‚Üí# Display the two-line footer
    48‚Üíecho -e "‚îå‚îÄ Context: ${context_color}${context_bar}${NC} ${context_percent}% ‚îÇ Task: ${current_task:0:15} ${task_color}${task_bar}${NC} ${progress_percent}% ‚îÇ Services: ${service_color}${service_bar}${NC} ${active_services}/${total_services} ‚îÄ‚îê"
    49‚Üíecho -e "‚îî‚îÄ Standby: ${BLUE}${standby_tasks:-no-active-tasks}${NC} ‚îÄ‚îò"
